Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to produce structured representation of high-level activities grouping events for each case Should list high-level steps e g Material Preparation Assembly Quality Inspection or Welding Protective Coating Application Final Check Provide rationale per grouping

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We can extract from sample retrieving raw metal sheet scanning barcode placing on table aligning preheating Material Preparation Then picking up welding tool welding corners A and B measuring weld integrity Welding Then visual check and coating maybe Coating Application Then drying visual check PostCoating Curing Quality Inspection Could also combine Final Inspection

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: But we need multiple cases they follow same pattern So propose high-level steps Step 1 Material Preparation Step 2 Welding Step 3 Weld Integrity Inspection maybe part of welding Step 4 Protective Coating Application Step 5 Coating Curing Drying Step 6 Final Visual Inspection Quality Check

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: But requirement each high-level step should represent a coherent stage So maybe cluster as 1 Case Initiation Material Handling retrieve scan place align preheat 2 Tool Preparation Welding pick tool weld corners A B 3 Weld Quality Verification measure integrity maybe separate 4 Coating Preparation apply coating 5 Coating Curing dry 6 Final Inspection visual check

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to output structured representation maybe JSON or table mapping case ID to sequence of high-level steps with timestamps or activity lists Lets propose output format list of high-level activities with name description included lowlevel events per case Provide rationale per activity Also include step names Material Preparation Welding Weld Integrity Check Protective Coating Application Coating Curing Final Visual Inspection Given instructions Assign meaningful domain-relevant names to each group Provide structured representation Lets produce a clear answer with rationale per grouping Will output in JSON-like structure Lets craft final answer
